website_summaries.verdict: Consists of a soft and lightweight rayon fabric constructed from bamboo fibers. Stays incredibly dry.
pros: Waterproof membrane on the sheet aims to block liquids from coming through while maintaining breathability
Feels comfortable against your skin with a 70% rayon (derived from bamboo fibers) and a 30% cotton fabric mix
Will fit tightly over the mattress with an elastic band on the edges of the sheet
cons: Some people won't like the thin material, as it won't give you the highest level of protection

customer_reviews.title: Worthy every penny at 4am.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son got sick and made just the most hideous mess of his bed (need I elaborate? It was ugly.). This was the middle of the night. I practically cried with joy when I realized my wife had put this mattress cover on that I ordered the prior week!! While this mattress cover looks and feels like *soft* absorbent fabric, it is 110% waterproof. It looked so soft and light I didn't believe at first that I couldn't​ believe it would work. No scent, no dampness under it.. Perfect. Tossed it and the sheets in the washing machine (hot cycle, extra detergent) and it washed up great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cool, and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases I have made in some time. We moved and bought new bedding for the children. Three of them are using older mattresses, so I bought these covers for them. They are soft, comfortable, and cool in the Summer heat. They don't make noise or crinkle. I forgot to check for special washing instructions and simply washed them on HOT with the rest of the bedding. They're fine! I'm impressed with the quality and the price. We will be buying more for the other children to use.
customer_reviews.author: WI Farm Family

customer_reviews.title: You would never know this is on the bed
customer_reviews.text: I have these on our two beds to keep our mattresses clean and to help with dust/allergies. I can't say I see any difference with allergies (I doubt anything would make that big of a difference). My concerns were that they would make the bed hot and that they would crinkle. They do not make either of our beds sleep hot. I have these paired with a plush mattress topper (zen bamboo) and I never hear any crinkle noises from them, in fact I forget they are there unless I take off the topper. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: so far, hits all my criteria
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for now. No major spills so may update later. Criteria 1. noise 2. function 3. design Noise is minimal. No crackling and plastic bag sounds. I tested it with a small glass of water before putting my regular sheets on. Works. But I got it to ensure the crazy new rescue cat doesn't mess up my mattress. Meaning, the big test is yet to come. Will update if that ever happens. I sure hope not. Design is where I wish I could take a half star off. The elastic isn't terribly strong and so it was a bit of a tussle to get the sheets on properly without pulling the Lucid pad out of place.
customer_reviews.author: mortdecai

customer_reviews.title: Realy waterproof
customer_reviews.text: For the price I didn't expect much of it but today it saved our child's mattress from a major sippy cup spilage! It is very thin basiclly a thin layer of plasic toped by a very thin layer of jersy and the borders are mesh. The first night or two the plastic was noisy but then its quiet. I would defintly by again.
customer_reviews.author: Mmum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well it's super soft and fit my new mattress perfectly I have the 10 inch queen
customer_reviews.author: Linda Samson

customer_reviews.title: I was so sad when someone stole this off of our porch right ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad when someone stole this off of our porch right before Christmas but they replaced it right away. Fits the Queen Sized Lucid perfectly. Got it in case I spill my morning coffee (I heard the Lucid bed will dissolve if it gets wet.) Better safe than sorry. Doesn't make that horrible plastic noise like most bed covers
customer_reviews.author: No Soup for You

customer_reviews.title: and it just seemed like a good idea to replace our old mattress protector ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these, two for guest beds, and one for my own bed. We have a two year old who climbs into bed with us often, and it just seemed like a good idea to replace our old mattress protector with a waterproof one. We LOVE this and it actually makes putting the sheets on easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Luciano

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality made mattress protector. Love the fabric. Fits mattress well. Provides great protection.
customer_reviews.author: jsk19

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, well worth price
customer_reviews.text: So much better than anticipated. I co-sleep with baby, so loads of spitup and puddle leaks and milk leaks here... none go through! I've washed and dried, still feels soft and you don't get that uncomfortable sweat like from other, less breathable materials. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It really is water proof
customer_reviews.text: I just accidentally dumped a bowl of beans in tomato sauce on my bed. I felt like crying but when I took off the sheets and this mattress protector, my mattress looked like new. Not a single drop got through to my snow white mattress. I love this protector. The sheet was soaked, the protector was "stained", but nothing went through to the mattress. The protector washed up beautifully and it really is soft and comfortable. So happy this was on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! We have 3 kids and just bought a new mattress, we bought this to protect it, and that it does! Spit ups, leaky diapers, and so much more have been spilled on our bed, but have not made it through to the mattress because of this gem. It fits well on our thin mattress (4") and would work well on thicker mattresses too. We will definately be purchasing these for all of our new mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check immediately upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I should have opened this immediately upon arrival and I would have returned it. It Sounds like something I had used in my babies crib. Because of the water proofing material woven in it, it makes it incredibly noisy. I didn't need to remove it completely from the packaging to hear it. Major bummer since I missed the return window by 4 days. I do not reccomend this mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Life in NAZ

customer_reviews.title: Already shows snags and has a hole
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this does exactly what it says- it is a waterproof mattress cover. I washed it each time after it has gotten wet (twice), and once when I first received it early June. I noticed the last time I was putting it on the bed that there are snags and small tears in a few parts. Which is a bummer! I followed cleaning directions exactly, so I’m pretty disappointed it seems to already be falling apart after a month of use.... Update: two months after purchasing, there is a definite leak in the protector. Unfortunately, it's too late to return through amazon, so I'll be contacting the company for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: 1000x Better Than My Previous Protector
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a brand new bed and IMMEDIATELY bought a mattress protector from Allerease because I suffer from allergies and asthma related to environment. The Allerease protector was a full protector and 1) it didn't fit my mattress snugly - instead it was baggy and trapped heat like crazy and 2) Made sleeping hot. I decided that, because of my personal hygiene habits, I didn't need the full case protector, but a top fitting one that was still waterproof. I found Lucid and I love that the protector sits flush with my mattress and doesn't leave air gaps under my sheets. I already love this brand! 10/10 from me!
customer_reviews.author: O truant Muse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress cover for about a year, and it has worked like a charm. We have a toddler who bedshares and her diaper sometimes leaks in the night. This mattress pad has kept our mattress in perfect condition. It washes well, and has been through many many washes. It doesn’t have the “trash bag” plastic sound, and it doesn’t change the feel of our memory foam mattress. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Well...Ive had this king size protector for over 2 months now but It hadnt been put to the test until now. I came home from work to find my dogs full blown pee on my bed. there was literally a puddle of pee on my bed. when I removed the sheet and protector I found a completely dry mattress so it has lived up to a big test of alot of a watery substance on the bed sitting for hours and didnt penetrate through to the mattress. I give this king size protector a A++ for softness, easy to wash and most of all its water resistance capabilities
customer_reviews.author: eazy e

customer_reviews.title: Lucid Mattress Cover fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a short while, so I cannot judge its durability- maybe I can repost after we move in and try it. However, the thin and soft cover, if it is indeed dust mite as well as spill proof will be great, because it fits snug and will not be in the way of sheets fitting well. It looks and feels nice. I particularly like that it is of bamboo rayon, not polyester, since that usually pills and the texture of polyester pilling would be felt through the sheet. So, looking forward to keeping our mattress clean with this cover. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S. Ho

customer_reviews.title: They leak! Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to protect a new mattress from leaky diapers. Imagine my surprise when I found that my brand new waterproof sheets leaked, and now my brand new mattress has pee on it. Totally useless. I bought three, after a little testing I’ve found that all three leak, so they are going straight to the garbage. What a waste. Worst product ever.
customer_reviews.author: BigRedAbraham

customer_reviews.title: Best Waterproof Topper ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has accidents still and this had saved our matress and hers. I have bought this in all sizes- twin, queen and king. Not problems at all. Also a plus that it is thin material as it does not take up the whole washer when it need to be washed. It does however take awhile to dry as it absorbs liquid so well. 20 stars in my eyes! Very minimal on sound to the point i can't even hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mattress "protector" is no waterproof like it claims
customer_reviews.text: This mattress "protector" is absolute trash. It does not live up to its claims at all. It is in no way waterproof at all. I bought this to protect an expensive mattress and due to it failing to do its main job a rather expensive mattress is ruined. If I can help just one person save their money by not buying this I will be happy. It is complete garbage and utterly useless. This is no different than putting a fitted sheet on your mattress to protect it. I would strongly recommend against buying this worthless item. Save your money and buy a product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Dotson

customer_reviews.title: I generally do not use mattress protectors because I loathe ...
customer_reviews.text: I generally do not use mattress protectors because I loathe the plasticy feeling and sounds of most bed protectors not to mention they’re not breathable so they tend to make your bed uncomfortable. This is not the case. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Fiendship Fun

customer_reviews.title: Super soft - can go right on top of hotel fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: We needed a dust mite mattress cover for hotel travel. I went to put this on the bed expecting it to be noisy or plasticy, but was pleasantly surprised how good it felt. We were able to put it directly on the hotel fitted sheet and sleep on it! Love that we didn’t need to strip the bed first.
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on. Very soft as well, though it does have a "plasticy" sound to it when laid on. Though that was to be expected and does not cause any nuisance. This item will help you sleep better knowing your mattress will not be ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Jared T.

customer_reviews.title: Makes noise and causes sheets to come off.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say how well this protector would hold up because I did not have it long enough. It seemed like a decent protector when it arrived. After about 2 weeks I had to return it for several reasons. First, this protector does make noise when moving around on the bed. Second, this protector caused the sheets to slip off of the mattress daily. Finally, it caused my spouse and I to sleep hotter at night.
customer_reviews.author: James Mecozzi

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this matress protector because I recently purchased a lucid 14 inch plush matress. My boyfriend apparently sweats in his sleep and it went through the supposed water resistant protective cover from lucid. I contacted lucid and with some negotiation I was sent a cleaning kit with a new matress protector ( the same one I previously purchased. I will see if it was some sort of defect and hopefully it will protect the matress.
customer_reviews.author: marierose88

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these on my son’s bed for 2+ years, and although they are soft & have withstood quite a few washes, I’m sad to report that they are NOT waterproof. They were finally put to the test when dog peed on the bed & it soaked all the way through, so now I will be replacing the foam mattress that is ruined. And I’ll be looking for some super duper waterproof covers & will not consider softness/noise factor this time. If you’re just looking to provide a barrier from dust, then these might work for you, if a waterproof cover is what you’re looking for, then keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: There is no noise or plastic feel. I also bought this protector for our queen mattress in our motor home. Not sure how water proof they are yet. But with 4 dogs I'm bound to find out.
customer_reviews.author: V. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: So Soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my sons bed praying it was not going to make him hot and uncomfortable while sleeping. It turned out to be very comfortable and not hot at all. The material seems to breathe easy and allow for the mattress to stay protected while soft and comfortable and not crinkly plastic. It feels as if you are not sleeping on a mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbunnie

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually read a ton of reviews before purchasing and they were all so good so I ended up buying two just to switch out for laundry days. We bought a really nice mattress and was hoping this would protect it from accidents and such. NOT AT ALL!! This is the absolute worst purchase you could make if your looking for a waterproof mattress cover. I gave it one more chance after the first incident but this time it doesn’t even look like it there was anything in between.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a new mattress and I wanted to get a thin, soft waterproof protector for it, but still be able to enjoy the feel of the mattress. Unfortunately I found this cover to be noisy and it moved around a bit under our sheets. I haven’t tested If it’s waterproof, I’m sure it is, but I also wanted something with that jersey sheet feel and this is just not it.
customer_reviews.author: jcourt

customer_reviews.title: It wrinkles itself and the sheets
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that it #1 does makes a slight noise #2 does tend to sleep hot and #3 it does move around and shift and bunch up on my Tempurpedic ProAdapt mattress and at the same time It is slick enough that it lets the sheets slide also. Every night I have to pull it in all directions to smooth out the folds. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: leecat

customer_reviews.title: Priced at Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are waterproof and machine washable. If you are truly looking for a high quality, breathable and non-synthetic feeling mattress protector look in a higher price range. These are a bit crinkly and feel synthetic to the touch as the cotton above the waterproofing layer is very thin. I can’t speak to the breathability as I have not slept on this in summer; my hopes aren’t high.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection from soiling your bed.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased these mattress covers to go over all my blankets as I like my dogs to sleep with me on my bed in case they have an accident they P on top of the bed and not into my blankets. I had a girlfriend smoking a bong and spilled a bottle water on it and it did not penetrate and that smell would’ve never got out of my bed. Are you These mattress covers for everything to protect my bed and all my bedding love it
customer_reviews.author: Bea Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Lucid Super Soft Rayon Bamboo queen size mattress protector, it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these mattress protectors now. They are great super soft, have a lot of depth in the fitted portion and look good! They are definitely worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Catz

customer_reviews.title: Works great, beware of cat’s claws/dog nails poking holes in it.
customer_reviews.text: Great from the start. I read that cats and pets shouldn’t be allowed on it because their claws/nails can poke holes in the fabric which will allow liquids to pass through. I believe that because it is thin material. I was worried that it would be hot/sweaty, but it’s not. I have it under my bedsheet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This product says that its waterproof but its not. Anything that is spilled goes right through and onto the mattress. Piece of garbage. Takes forever to dry but dont put it in the dryer because it will shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Signature Sleep Memoir 8-Inch Memory Foam Mattress. You do hear a little noise when you lie down, but only then. You don't even know its there when you're resting. Given that it is suppose repel liquids that may enter the mattress I think that's safe to expect from any mattress protector. Anyway, great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Packaged arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Guess this cover isnt water proof after all...even inside the packaging the cover was ruined with water damage and what looks to be rust. The amazon box was perfectly fine with no damage whatsoever...so someone had to literally ship this thing out looking like that....returning and went with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Already tested the waterproof claim unfortunately. Happy to report it is waterproof. I like this protector because it’s thin so when I do wash it, it doesn’t make my washer off balance. It’s thin like a sheet but really works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not waterproof as described. I am very upset that my daughters new mattress is ruined after only a month of use. She is 5 and wet the bed and immediately woke up. I assumed it wasn't an issue as I had the protectors on both of her bunk beds, but boy was I wrong. What I thought was a simple sheet and protector swap turned out to be a 1AM mattress swap. It was as if I had 2 sheets on the bed. Her new mattress soaked in the urine faster than the cotton sheets did.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Definitely does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It is washable, but has to be ran through dryer a couple of times because of the water resistant side. It saved our new mattress when my daughter peed on it. Easy to clean but not all stains come out easily. If you have a tall mattress make sure to buy deep pocket sheets because the softness of the protector makes regular sheets slide off the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Terentieva

customer_reviews.title: Great thin protector that finally allows me to feel the magic of my mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one cause the last one didn’t allow me to really feel the comfort of my mattress (that I paid for). Don’t get me wrong, the last one was good but this one being as thin off as it is allows me to really feel the Casper mattress that we have. I’m glad I found it after much research. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps cool
customer_reviews.text: I'm someone who runs warm and rarely if ever sleeps with a sheet in the summer. This protector sleeps very cool and comfortable. It was also very easy to wash/dry as I did that as soon as it arrived (I always wash things before first use). I can't speak to the water resistance as there haven't been any incidents that would put that feature to the test. I spent hours pouring over reviews on different products; but I can say that I'm happy with the purchase I made. We use this on a Purple mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DePaolis

customer_reviews.title: Best protective cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great protection! Had a glass of grape juice spill all over brand new bed but because I had on this cover not a drop got on the mattress. Once I washed the cover, it looked new again. I also love the fact it doesn't make the bed hot and it doesn't make noise when you move on it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve or Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully stretchy! Covers 4" mattress topper and regular mattress easily! Even if you don't trust the water resistance of the fabric side you can just flip it inside out and put the impermeable layer on top (like my parents did when they were visiting in case of (ahem) elderly accidents. :0) Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looooove this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress cover, has already saved me money. Had a quick spill scare, crisis was averted due to this cover. For that reason I will highly recommend this brand to anybody. It's also very quite at night, no wrinkle, crinkles or anything of the sort.
customer_reviews.author: Trav C

customer_reviews.title: Hot hot hot!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector makes me sweat so I no longer use it. If you are looking for something cooling, keep looking because this isn’t it. It was easy to wash and there is no noise when on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't feel like a tough plastic sheet
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for something to keep our memory foam mattress protected from our son's nighttime accidents, all I was hoping for was protection. This gave me not only protection but comfort! It doesn't feel like a tough plastic sheet. It just seems like an extra sheet, but there are absolutely no leaks! It's fantastic! I bought a second one I loved it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amber O.

customer_reviews.title: Does what  it is supposed to, keeps mattress dry
customer_reviews.text: Son has had 3 accidents since buying these mattress protectors, and every time it's prevented any moisture from hitting the mattress. That's really about all I think is necessary in a mattress protector. It's soft enough, but a sheet is over it so that doesn't matter. IT comes clean easily and without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Goom

customer_reviews.title: Very soft - we bought several for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Lucid mattresses for our 3 and 4yo and decided to get the same brand covers. These are thin but soft and work well, very stretchy and easy to put on. We bought four.
customer_reviews.author: 2LittleBearsMom

customer_reviews.title: Great at what they do...protect the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love these! After several months of use with small children (ages 3 & 5), and several "accidents" and a stomach bug (sorry to be gross), I'm pleased to report my new mattresses were perfectly protected with these covers! They fit well and I would buy again. Five stars for quality.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This mattress pad is super lightweight and we haven't had any issues with any ...
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeee this mattress protector. I didn't want to spend too much on one, so I was really hoping this one did the job and it did. I'm not a fan of the noisy ones where you can make the smallest movement and all you hear is swish, swish, swish. Nobody wants to hear that. I also have a baby, so I'm constantly trying to move around him in silence. This mattress pad is super lightweight and we haven't had any issues with any liquid leaking through. It also has the feel of a regular sheet so there aren't any unwanted bulges in your fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Houlden

customer_reviews.title: The quality is nice enough, but they are too large for any ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is nice enough, but they are too large for any of our beds. Pillowtop mattresses are a thing of the past, but these covers are designed for deep pockets. They slide around on our low profile mattresses. We purchased all sizes (twin-king) for various beds in our home and ended up keeping them because the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pet Barrier
customer_reviews.text: My dogs sleep in my bed and I don't want any deep rooted pet smells. This works well and has held up to several washings. It fits fine on my mattress and doesn't make a bunch of noise like some others have. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: JWill

customer_reviews.title: Plastic lining defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that the bamboo is lined with plastic. If I wanted to sleep on plastic I could’ve ordered something very simple. I was hoping to be able to sleep on something breathable, that would not be Suffocated by plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATERPROOF!! First pet accident happened within a few days of putting this new cover on a new mattress, and the cat urine totally soaked through... yuck. I had higher expectations because of all the other positive reviews but sadly the price/description were too good to be true. Threw it away because of the smell so could not ask for a warranty/refund.
customer_reviews.author: doc blue

customer_reviews.title: No noise good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mattress protector. I’m still trying to figure out what noise others were hearing in there reviews. Only conclusion I could come to was maybe they had dry feet rubbing on the sheet. Idk but anyway it’s no noise at all. I ordered an extra one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Goodloe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not waterproof or water resistant. Dog urine soaked clear through. So mad!
customer_reviews.author: Firewoman

customer_reviews.title: Great product will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that it’s made from Jersey sheets so it feels soft like a T-shirt. Came next day. I poured some water on it to see if it leaked and it didn’t leak through.. I’m so happy I bought this. No noise either can’t tell it’s on the bed!
customer_reviews.author: AnGie McKenna the expert shopper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just got this about a week ago and so far I have no complaints. I have not spilled anything on it to determine if it's water proof or not. But I am happy with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M S

customer_reviews.title: Mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Works great with extra deep mattress and doesn’t crinkle, makes no sound! Protects mattress from pet accidents great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfectly comfortable, not hot
customer_reviews.text: It's a little crinkly sounding, but besides the sound you wouldn't know its there. It's perfectly comfortable, not hot, and has already proven its usefulness when i find mud from the pets on the sheets but no sign on the mattress. I now have 2 of these, one for the guest bed too.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight and does not make any sounds when sleeping on it. Perfect for when my grandkids come over to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Quality bed protection
customer_reviews.text: fits my brand new bed perfectly. Feels soft and durable. Havent got it wet yet so i can't speak to the waterproof claims.
customer_reviews.author: BirdNet9

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Protector For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: A great mattress pad for a great price. We’ve been using this on a guest bed and love that it’s so easy to wash. Just make sure that it’s washed and dried on low heat, as per other reviewers. We highly recommend this mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great matress protector
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this would be noisy or uncomfortable to sleep on, due to the waterproofing quality. But I don't even know it's on. Just as comfortable. My dog had an accident shortly after buying it, and it performed perfectly. Nothing reached the matress. And after washing, it held up fine
customer_reviews.author: CorsoGuy

customer_reviews.title: It works great! ...just remember to tumble dry on low or hang it up to dry
customer_reviews.text: I have two boys that wet the bed and this protector has held up well. There was bed-wetting a few times a week for months with no leak problems... and then I impatiently started putting it on higher heat in the dryer. The protective barrier started getting tiny cracks and we started to see leaks here and there. If you wash and dry as directed, then I think they really are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: April H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you want the keep unpleasant odors on your mattress
customer_reviews.text: This was horrible! I bought this for each of my young sons’ beds and for my brand new mattress to preserve it. It soaked in the urine (theirs) and the sweat (outs) and kept it trapped b/w the top and bottom. I tried washing it and could not remove the pee smell. It was hot and caused us to sweat even more. I ended up throwing it away after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Zola L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for half a year now and they look just like when we got them and get softer each time they are washed! They have done a great job protecting the mattresses when my son has gotten sick too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover was easy to clean and install! On top of the 3" Lucid Mattress pad, it's like sleeping on a dream! The cover fit right down to the bottom (and below) our current mattress and stretched tight without problem. Yowza! We are already discussing one for the guest room. The only problem is that guests might not want to leave!
customer_reviews.author: Dark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Protected bed from pet urine 5*
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must if you have a puppy. It has saved me at least twice after my puppy had an accident on my bed. The urine did not penetrate into the mattress below and after a wash this protector was stain-free
customer_reviews.author: Shiva Rampaul

customer_reviews.title: but is very nice! I haven't tested the waterproofness of it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our guest bed. It is used infrequently, but is very nice! I haven't tested the waterproofness of it, but it seems as nice as higher-quality mattress protectors that we have on other beds.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover makes me sweat!! And I run cold when I sleep, so that's not normal for me. Waking up in a cold sweat is definitely not fun. Will be looking for a different mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay F.

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the 3 inch foam bed topper. This sheet was supposed to be able to cover my mattress and the foam padding. But since day 1 it has been slowly coming off the sides so I have to constantly pull the sheet down. Overall the sheet is nothing special comfort wise but was supposed to be big enough for their name brand foam pad but it DOES NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for two years and it has survived ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for two years and it has survived my dog peeing on it twice. Works as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Al Mc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Not as “deep” as I wish it could be and it skips off easily but it is good for the price and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: caity

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I washed and dried this item gently before use and it held up well. I like the deep pockets; I have a 14 inch mattress and the elastic in this cover was strong enough to hug it well. This is my first experience with a waterproof cover, I ordered it for the price (nice), not the water repellent, so that's a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: P A R

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after 2 washes
customer_reviews.text: By second wash the waterproofing began to have fissures. By third washing the protector has multiple HOLES in the waterproof cover. Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: LCoop

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: Spilled some water on my bed and it didn't get through to the matress. awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, but it works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased: queen Price: seventeen bucks, and wouldn't pay a penny more Fit: protective surface skimpy on overhang, depth is accommodating Material: soft Noise: minimal R-Value: low Waterproof: yes, top only Breathable: yes, sides only QC: arrived with some brown dots/stains Longevity: TBD, expecting to last no longer than 1 year with regular washing
customer_reviews.author: turbocat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. You want be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: julie waldroup

customer_reviews.title: Great for LUCID mattress
customer_reviews.text: Fits well to my LUCID 10 inch mattress. Comfortable and no crackling sounds. Haven't tried to see if it's water resistance and haven't washed it yet. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Tong

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one that I’ve had and I love it. The original one is still in great condition but I’d tell anyone these are the best and you can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Seems great, not leak proof.
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well, cleans well, not leak proof at all. Stains on bed underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon7Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yup! It's waterproof. It wont hold much water, so you should probably air-dry when washing.
customer_reviews.author: ashenafi ayalew

customer_reviews.title: Cover is light and keeps mattress cool
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress cover because it’s so light and soft. It does not trap heat, in fact it keeps my mattress cool. I do recommend washing it first and drying on low heat only. I haven’t had any spills or pet accidents so I can’t review the waterproof protection part yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It was just what we wanted and compared to other prices I saw it was very economical
customer_reviews.author: Chele McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fitted mattress pad. It doesn't look waterproof, but it is. I poured a glass of water on it to make sure. The water pooled, but never went through onto the mattress. Easy to wash and dry. I've never had such an easy mattress pad. I'm buying another for our own bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Sooo soft yet water resistant. This was perfect for my sons bed.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Socha

customer_reviews.title: Would Definitely Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I love this. We've had it for a few months now. Its held up well in the wash and its not let spilled water leak through to the mattress. The quality is definitely worth the fair price tag. I appreciate that our 3 year old is not sleeping on plastic, yet its still water proof!
customer_reviews.author: USAlpha 1

customer_reviews.title: Great preventative measure
customer_reviews.text: Great product spill in leak proof. My daughter is a toddler and still having accidents so this is a great preventative and protective measure for the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Gloss

customer_reviews.title: Worry buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I like it. Waterproof even after 2 years and several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't make any noise that disturbs the sleeper and is super soft. The matress cover has also held up ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits over a twin size matress and the Japanese futon I use. It doesn't make any noise that disturbs the sleeper and is super soft. The matress cover has also held up against surprise sharkweek arrival and kept the futon underneath pristine. It does smell a little bit when first our of the package, but it went away after one wash.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Carson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Very little evidence of that "plastic" feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Very little evidence of that "plastic" feel of a traditional mattress cover when handled. On the bed it is really not noticeable. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This item was an Amazon recommendation when I was purchasing the 4" tri-fold full size mattress. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: It does as it says, doesn’t smell, and resists water so well that it will occasionally have a puddle in it after going through the washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Anchor

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, fabric is cool and does not make noise when lying on it. I have purchased other covers from bigger brand names that were twice the price but extremely hot and made crinkly plastic noise while sleeping. I use it to protect my mattress from my dog, haven’t washed it yet but so far so good. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Definitely saved my bed with having 3 kids !! Feels great looks nice !
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Fazende

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof forever
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered them in 2017. It's 2020 and they stopped being waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Asja, the Reviewer

product_meta.title: LUCID Premium Rayon from Bamboo Jersey Mattress Protector - Ultra Soft - Waterproof - Dust Mite Proof - Hypoallergenic - King
product_meta.description: Size:KingProtection from Fluids, Accidents, Dust Mites and Allergens. The LUCID Rayon from Bamboo Jersey Mattress Protector is soft, light and protects the top of your mattress from fluids, dust mites and allergens. It is protection made comfortable, with a soft, lightweight feel that does not feel bulky on your mattress.Incredibly Soft and Breathable Fabric. A blend of 70 percent rayon from bamboo and 30 percent cotton creates the perfect jersey fabric. In addition to being incredibly soft, the fabric is highly breathable and exceptionally good at moving moisture away from the body. This protector is designed to be lightweight and unfilled, so it does not change the feel of your mattress. Quiet, Vinyl Free Waterproof Membrane. Beneath the soft fabric is the STRATOSMART Barrier, a polyurethane backing that blocks all liquids with confidence, and prevents dust mites, pet dander and common allergens from reaching your mattress. Thousands of microscopic openings allow the barrier to block out the stuff you do not want on your mattress while allowing airflow for a comfortable climate. Smooth Stretch Fit, Made with a fitted sheet design, this soft, noiseless mattress protector goes on easily and is simple to remove for laundering. The knitted sidewall has an elastic around the skirt that stretches to fit thicker mattresses, including pillow top and memory foam mattresses, and has a smooth, secure fit. Care and Warranty, Mattress protector can be machine washed in warm water with mild detergent and tumble dried on low heat with other bedding. Do not iron, dry clean or use bleach or detergent with whiteners. Drying above recommended temperatures may damage waterproof barrier. This LUCID product is backed by a 15-year warranty. Sidewall: 100 percent polyester, Backing: 100 percent polyurethane
feature_bullets: A premium blend of 70% rayon from bamboo and 30% cotton creates a breathable, ultra-soft, and moisture wicking surface to keep you comfortable and dry through the night

Beneath the soft fabric surface, our quiet proprietary STRATOSMART barrier protects the top of your mattress from all liquids, dust mites, and allergens with confidence while allowing airflow for a comfortable temperature
Designed to be lightweight so it does not change the feel of your mattress, this secure fitted sheet style protector has deep pockets that stretch to fit mattresses up to an 18-inch depth
Keep your bedding clean and fresh with easy-care; Machine washable and tumble dry on low heat
King size measures 76 x 80; Confidently backed with our 15-year warranty
